channel.title: 562 WebClient Problem
channel.description:
Greetings MoparScapers!
Alright, I'm having a major problem with my Webclient, it's hosted on a free hosting site, maybe that's the problem. When i click on WebClient.php, it loads java correctly, then it starts downloading my Cache that i have uploaded. The Cache is perfectly fine, same with the jar file. I tested on my main computer, it downloaded the Cache perfectly fine, I tested on my other computer, It runs windows 7, It downloads the Cache perfectly fine. But when i try and download it on my other other computer, It runs XP Professional windows, It downloads the Cache up-to 8% then it completely crashes. So i tested it on my friends computer, It wont even Download the Cache. I'm pretty sure i'm not doing anything wrong, It could be the Free hosting site. The Cache is uploaded to mediafire. I got a direct link to the Cache.
Please try it out, You wont be able to Login to the server, Because i haven't released it yet.
http://thunderscape.site40.net/webclient.php
Edited: I found out only people who run XP windows have this problem. Windows 7 and vista works fine.
